mainText:
I was shocked by the news that Mr.jobs passed away.

I have admired his speech “connecting the dots...” 

Its in my mind forever.

 

It was too early death.

I can’t believe and I don’t want to believe he is dead.

 

The world has lost a precious human beings.

He is great.

He is a only person who is built a “PC world”

 

His distinguished services will remain forever.
author: Anonymous
